/**
 * 该文件专门用于暴露一个store对象，整个应用只有一个store对象
 */
// 引入createStore,用于常见store对象
import { createStore, applyMiddleware } from "redux"; // 引入为count组件服务的reducer

import countReducer from "./count_reducer"; // 引入redux-thunk用于异步redux

import thunk from "redux-thunk"; // 暴露store

export default createStore(countReducer);
